select t.user_id as userId, t.user_name as userName, t.nick_name as nickName, t.email, t.avatar, t.mobile, t.user_type as userType, t.user_desc as userDesc, t.status, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime, t3.account, t2.role_name as roleName, t2.is_system as isSystem from system_user t left join system_user_role t1 on t.user_id=t1.user_id left join system_role t2 on t1.role_id=t2.role_id and t2.role_type=#{map.type} inner join system_account t3 on t.account_id=t3.account_id
t.type=#{map.type}
or t.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{map.userName},'%')
or t.email like CONCAT('%',#{map.email},'%')
or t.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{map.mobile})
or t3.account like CONCAT('%',#{map.account})
order by t.create_time desc
